title: Android 11 App Opening Lag
content:
Hi

The new app opening animations are causing my phone to lag, does anyone have a fix or way to disable them?

Pixel 2XL

Edit: I found the way to disable them (just search for "animations" in settings), however this only feels like a band-aid not a proper fix as now it feels "weird" (I didn't have a better adjective)

Thanks
